pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Negative Garrote Estimation with Penalized Initial Estimators // Functions to compute the non-negative garrote estimator as proposed by Breiman (1995) https://www.jstor.org/stable/1269730 with the penalized initial estimators extension as proposed by Yuan and Lin (2007) https://www.jstor.org/stable/4623260.
